name: Embed Odnoklassniki Video
author: Shumaher

sections.description:
Use video ID (or link) and shortcode [okvideo width=”491″ height=”285″]12345[/okvideo] to embed video.
width/height parameters are optional and these their default values.

Note: Because Odnoklassniki.ru does not provide “official” embed-code for the videos (that’s why this plugin was written), your videos MAY STOP PLAYING AT ANY TIME!!!
sections.installation:
1. Upload embed-odnoklassniki-video.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
After I click play button, there is only black frame – embedded video not load

Probably you have no permissions to view this video on Odnoklassniki.ru, so its won’t load on your WP too.

On WP instead of playing I get “Video not found” message, but on Odnoklassniki.ru same video plays normally

The video you try to embed actually not hosted on Odnoklassniki – those videos can’t be embed. You can open original video page (on YouTube, etc.) and find emded-code there.

short_description: Embeds video from Odnoklassniki.ru to your WordPress blog.
description:
Use video ID (or link) and shortcode [okvideo width=”491″ height=”285″]12345[/okvideo] to embed video.
width/height parameters are optional and these their default values.

Note: Because Odnoklassniki.ru does not provide “official” embed-code for the videos (that’s why this plugin was written), your videos MAY STOP PLAYING AT ANY TIME!!!
